availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

creation.placeName: Saint Louis, Saint Louis County, Missouri

body.p:
To His Excellency
B Magoffin
Governor of the State of Kentucky

The undersigned respectfully prays for the appointment of Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in this City
St Louis

The undersigned respectfully recommend Mr Rudolph Mackwitz a Notary Public within and for the County of St Louis to Your Excellency as worthy to receive the appointment of Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky

Thos. L Stegier
Jno Magoffin MD.
J. W. Wills
Geo. E. Harding

Missouri
Comr. of Deeds
Rudolph Mackwitz
City St. Louis
Com Issd. Nov 29 1861
